entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
